page.title: 11A Day in the Life of Sally
page.content: On Saturday I got up,washed and dressed.I went downstairs,had my hair done,had breakfast and got in the car. We went to the canal boat where Mom works.On the way we saw some shops. I had a mouse and my sister had a teddy bear. Then we had dinner. We put the bag in the boat and went for a walk along the tow-path. After the walk we went back to the boat. We went for a trip on boat. I opened a lock and the dog kept jumping on me. We only went a little way and the boat stopped and we had to pull it back. We went back on the boat for tea and a drink. Then we went back home and went to bed. I took my mouse to bed and my sister took her teddy bear too.
